name: mm::page_size

mm::nr_subpage_per_huge.doc: The number of sub pages in a huge page.

core::num::<impl usize>::ilog2.doc:
Returns the base 2 logarithm of the number, rounded down.

 # Panics

 This function will panic if `self` is zero.
